The reason I like keybase over alternatives like telegram, signal, etc:

+ They give you tools for E2E communication outside their platform
+ No need to publicly expose a phone number
+ One tool for encrypted chat + email
+ Identity verification with other services

Hey all, if you want to get involved in writing code that tries to address the current political crises we are facing as a nation – step 0 is to get set up on keybase. I'm at https://t.co/YsGckudfkr - that way you can securely message/email me and others.
